question1.content: 1. In which sector of activity is your company active? (linked with your APE code)?

question2.content: 2. What is the number of employees in your company on 18/12/31 ?

question3.content: 3. What is the turnover of your company in the last fiscal year? (or annual budget for Public sector)

question4.content: 4. Do you develop digital services for internal or external use (sales to customers)?

question5.content: 5. What is the number of users of your digital services?

question6.content: 6. Do you apply the rules and best practices for digital accessibility?

question7.content: 7. Have you optimized the states and printouts in your application tools (reduced number of pages when printing, ink consumption ...)

question8.content: 8. Do you integrate the principles of the ecodesign of digital services?

question9.content: 9. Do you use a modular application architecture?

question10.content: 10. Do you do a design review at the end of your application's development?

question11.content: 11. What is the overall storage volume of your corporate data (centralized on external hard drives, centralized server, NAS, SAN ...) in Terabytes (TB) useful?

question12.content: 12. Do you have a server or do you only work with one or more workstations?

question13.content: 13. Do you have a dedicated room, simple room or cupboard with bay dedicated to your IT infrastructure?

question14.content: 14. Is your computer room in house or at a host?

question15.content: 15. What is the total area of your computer rooms (excluding technical infrastructure *)? (in m2)

question16.content: 16. Do you know the PUE * of your Data Center?

question17.content: 17. What is the rate of charge or energy use of your computer rooms?
question17.description: Rate = Electrical power absorbed by your IT equipment, divided by room capacity in kW, then multiplied by 100 (used energy / available energy)

question18.content: 18. Have you led or are you planning actions to optimize your infrastructure? Especially :

question19.content: 19. The purchase of non-IT equipment from IT rooms (air conditioning, air treatment, inverters, etc.) according to energy efficiency criteria

question20.content: 20. Implementing the good practices of the 'European Code of Conduct for DataCenter'?

question22.content: 22. Regular monitoring of environmental indicators of computer rooms

question23.content: 23. Environmental impact analysis of the datacenter in life cycle approach

question24.content: 24. Optimizing the architecture and layout of rooms

question25.content: 25. The urbanization of halls in hot / cold aisles

question27.content: 27. The use of natural cooling sources (freecooling)

question28.content: 28. Implementation of a heat recovery system for computer rooms (heating)

question29.content: 29. The set temperature in the cold corridor remains higher than 24 Â°

question30.content: 30. The choice of a modular datacenter architecture

question31.content: 31. Have you led or are you planning actions to optimize your infrastructure? Especially :

question36.content: 36. The correct sizing of the servers in relation to their use

question37.content: 37. Give priority to ASHRAE 2 compatible equipment

question38.content: 38. A procedure for provisioning and de-provisioning data-processing equipment in datacenters

question39.content: 39. Do you know the number of physical servers and virtual servers in your company?

question40.content: 40. How many physical servers do you have?

question41.content: 41. How many virtual servers do you have?

questio42.content: 42. What will be the evolution of your number of physical servers for 2019? (in% or quantity)

question43.content: 43. What will be the evolution of your number of virtual servers for 2019? (in% or quantity)

question44.content: 44. Has your company appointed a Green IT Manager / Digital Manager?

question45.content: 45. Do you have a responsible digital strategy broken down into an action plan?

question46.content: 46. Is Green IT a topic integrated into your CSR strategy?

question47.content: 47. Do you regularly evaluate the environmental impacts of your information system?

question48.content: 48. Do you have a team of competent referees on the topics of Green IT?

question49.content: 49. Have you integrated Green IT into your business strategy

question50.content: 50. Do you have those equipments in your compagny:
question50.description: Used: equipment used in the business activity. Not used functional: equipment in working order but no more used by the company (stored). Neither used nor functional: out of service equipment (HS) waiting for end of life treatment.

question53.content: 53. Small printers (<15kg, potentially used by a household)

question55.content: 55. Other flat screens (TV, projection screen, digital board ...)

question59.content: 59. Fixed telephones (standalone not connected to such a standard)

question62.content: 62. Do you have other devices in your company?
question62.description: Keyboards, mouse, graphic tablets, scanners, microphones, speakers, office equipment ...

question63.content: 63. Regarding other devices, do you have in your company:
question63.description: Used: equipment used in the business activity. Not used functional: equipment in working order but no more used by the company (stored). Neither used nor functional: out of service equipment (HS) waiting for end of life treatment.

question70.content: 70. Do you know the consumption of your workstation in kWh per year?

question71.content: 71. Do you track the energy consumption of your compagny activities?

question72.content: 72. Do you know the share of IT and IT equipment in your company's total energy consumption?

question73.content: 73. Have you set up a power management system? (automatic shutdown / shutdown of workstations)

question74.content: 74. Do you use copiers from a repackaging industry (second-hand / second-hand)?

question75.content: 75. Do you consolidate individual printers to shared printers?

question76.content: 76. Have you set up an identification system on printers (to trigger printing)?

question77.content: 77. What is the average life of your professional copier / MFP *?

question78.content: 78. Are your printers set by default in eco mode? Especially :

question83.content: 83. What is the number of pages printed / day / employee? (A4 equivalent)

question84.content: 84. Can you specify the number of cartridges / toners:

question85.content: 85. Do you organize the separate collection of waste cartridges / toners?

question86.content: 86. Do you prefer the use of recycled paper?

question88.content: 88. Do you organize the separate collection of waste paper for recycling?
